definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
half/semi-/incomplete/(after a number) and a half
lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)

sentences.chinese: 牠的下半生能夠改變嗎？

sentences.english: The ball he put over at the start of the second half at Hull was like Beckham in his prime.
sentences.chinese: 對赫爾城下半場剛開始他射進的入球像極了貝克漢姆。

sentences.english: Cal stays out every night until after midnight.
sentences.chinese: 凱爾每晚在外面一呆就是到下半夜。

sentences.english: Pedestrians were splashed to the HIP in muddy slush.
sentences.chinese: 行人走在泥漿中，下半身全濺上了污泥。

sentences.english: No matter how steadfast the upper half is , it just can't defeat the weakness of the lower half.
sentences.chinese: 他上半身多麼堅貞，也敵不過下半身的軟弱。

sentences.english: Milan showed compactness, risking very little in the second half.
sentences.chinese: 米蘭表現的很簡潔，在下半場沒有製造什麼威脅。

sentences.english: Located in Suzhou Xiangcheng Economic Development Zone, we plan to start our operation in 2016.
sentences.chinese: 公司計劃於2016年下半年開始正式運營生產。

sentences.english: Performance was much stronger during the latter half of the six-month reporting period.
sentences.chinese: 更強的性能在下半年的申報期內六個月。

sentences.english: Dayton was substituted for Williams in the second half of the match.
sentences.chinese: 下半場比賽由戴頓代替威廉上場。

sentences.english: I think we played well tonight, better in the second half than the first"."
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我們今晚踢得很好，下半時尤佳。

sentences.english: Citigroup also plans to introduce a new stock option program later this year.
sentences.chinese: 該集團也計劃在今年下半年實行新的股票選擇權方案。

sentences.english: England brought on a sub in the second half.
sentences.chinese: 英國隊下半場換上了一名替補隊員。

sentences.english: Cook until after midnight, I very not easy to fall asleep.
sentences.chinese: 熬到下半夜，我好不容易纔睡着了。

sentences.english: Hui and Rong fell in love with each other. His lower body became completely paralyzed.
sentences.chinese: 輝和蓉相親相愛，但自從輝受傷後，下半身完全癱瘓。

sentences.english: Cervical spondylosis is a very common condition that usually occurs in the second half of life.
sentences.chinese: 頸椎病是非常普遍的情況下通常發生在下半年的生活。

sentences.english: The ground-breaking is expected some time in the second half of this year.
sentences.chinese: 廣珠城際快速軌道有望今年下半年開工。

definition: middle (of a period of time)/medium-term (plan, forecast etc)
to wind up/to bring to an end/to finish
a portion smaller than a half/the lesser part/the smaller part
